flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Once it catchesnthe wind, it deft­nly controls itsfcotton-puff sporesnto float, evennaround the world.
Drifts on seasonalnwinds and spreadsnits cotton-likefspores all overnthe world to makenmore offspring.
Even in the fierc­nest wind, it canncontrol its flufffto make its way tonany place in thenworld it wants.
JUMPLUFF rides warm southern winds toncross the sea and fly to foreign lands.nThe POKéMON descends to the groundfwhen it encounters cold air while it isnfloating.
JUMPLUFF rides warm southern winds toncross the sea and fly to foreign lands.nThe POKéMON descends to the groundfwhen it encounters cold air while it isnfloating.
JUMPLUFF ride warm southern winds toncross the sea and fly to foreign lands.nThis POKéMON lands when it encountersncold air while it is floating.
It drifts on seasonal winds and spreadsnits cotton-like spores all over the world nto make more offspring.
Once it catches the wind, it deftlyncontrols its cotton-puff spores to float,neven around the world.
Blown by seasonal winds, itncircles the globe, scatteringncotton spores as it goes.

Once it catches the wind, it deftlyncontrols its cotton-puff spores--nit can even float around the world.
Drifts on seasonal winds and spreadsnits cotton-like spores all overnthe world to make more offspring.
Poussé par les vents saisonniers,nil fait le tour du globe en semantndes spores de coton.

きせつふうに　ながされてnせかいを　いっしゅうしてしまう。nとちゅうで　わたほうしを　ばらまく。
계절풍에 날려서n세계 일주를 해 버린다.n도중에 솜 포자를 흩뿌린다.
Poussé par les vents saisonniers, il fait le tourndu globe en semant des spores de coton.
Es lässt sich von den Winden um den Globus tragennund verteilt auf seinem Flug Baumwollsamen.
Los vientos estacionales lo llevan por todo el mundo,ndonde va soltando sus esporas.
Sospinto dai venti stagionali, gira intorno al globonsparpagliando i suoi semi simili al cotone.
Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe,nscattering cotton spores as it goes.
季節風に　流されてn世界を　１周してしまう。n途中で　綿胞子を　ばらまく。
どんな　かぜに　あおられてもnわたげを　じざいに　あやつってnせかいの　すきなところへ　いける。
어떤 바람이 불더라도n솜털을 자유자재로 조종하여n세계의 좋아하는 곳으로 갈 수 있다.
Même sous un vent très violent, il contrôle sandestination en bougeant ses appendices.
Auch im stärksten Wind kann es kontrollieren,nwo seine Saat auf dem Erdball niedergehen soll.
Aunque sople el viento más fuerte, es capaz dencontrolar los pompones y moverse por donde quiera.
Anche nel vento forte controlla abilmente il suonbatuffolo per volare in ogni parte del mondo.
Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff tonmake its way to any place in the world it wants.
どんな　風に　あおられてもn綿毛を　自在に　操ってn世界の　好きなところへ　行ける。
あたたかい　みなみかぜに　のって　うみを　こえnがいこくまで　とんでいってしまう　ポケモン。nつめたい　くうきに　ふれると　じめんに　おりる。
따뜻한 남풍을 타고 바다를 건너n외국까지 날아가는 포켓몬이다.n차가운 공기에 닿으면 땅에 내려온다.
Cotovol traverse la mer, porté par les vents, pour découvrirnde nouveaux territoires. Ce Pokémon se rapproche du solnquand le vent est trop froid.
Papungha nutzt den Südwind, um das Meer zu überqueren undnin ferne Länder zu fliegen. Dieses Pokémon sinkt zu Boden,nwenn es während seines Fluges auf kalte Luftschichten stößt.
Jumpluff se vale de los cálidos vientos del sur para volar antierras lejanas. Si llega a zonas de aire frío en pleno vuelo,ndescenderá y tomará tierra.
Jumpluff si affida alle correnti d’aria calda per attraversarenil mare e volare verso terre lontane. Questo Pokémonnridiscende a terra quando incontra una corrente freddanmentre fluttua.
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly tonforeign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when itnencounters cold air while it is floating.
暖かい　南風に　乗って　海を　越えn外国まで　飛んでいってしまう　ポケモン。n冷たい　空気に　触れると　地面に　降りる。
あたたかい　みなみかぜに　のって　うみを　こえnがいこくまで　とんでいってしまう　ポケモン。nつめたい　くうきに　ふれると　じめんに　おりる。
따뜻한 남풍을 타고 바다를 건너n외국까지 날아가는 포켓몬이다.n차가운 공기에 닿으면 땅에 내려온다.
Cotovol traverse la mer, porté par les vents, pour découvrirnde nouveaux territoires. Ce Pokémon se rapproche du solnquand le vent est trop froid.
Papungha nutzt den Südwind, um das Meer zu überqueren undnin ferne Länder zu fliegen. Dieses Pokémon sinkt zu Boden,nwenn es während seines Fluges auf kalte Luftschichten stößt.
Jumpluff se vale de los cálidos vientos del sur para volar antierras lejanas. Si llega a zonas de aire frío en pleno vuelo,ndescenderá y tomará tierra.
Jumpluff si affida alle correnti d’aria calda per attraversarenil mare e volare verso terre lontane. Questo Pokémonnridiscende a terra quando incontra una corrente freddanmentre fluttua.
Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly tonforeign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when itnencounters cold air while it is floating.
暖かい　南風に　乗って　海を　越えn外国まで　飛んでいってしまう　ポケモン。n冷たい　空気に　触れると　地面に　降りる。
Die Baumwollsamen, die Papungha verstreut,nmachen Allergikern das Leben schwer.
Mit seinen Fallschirmchen lässt es sich vomnWind tragen. Bei günstigen Luftströmungennkommt es schneller als Vogel-Pokémon voran.
